Texts.Eng: Find ^green;other types of bees^reset;, and cross-breed them within. You never know what you'll end up with! I suggest searching for ^green;Forest Bees^reset; as soon as possible!

Now you need to ^green;catch a queen and a drone honey bee^reset; and let them loose inside your apiary. You'll need a ^orange;Bug Net^reset; for this. Bees can be found on most biomes, usually during the daylight hours.
